channel.title: Android AAB?
channel.description:
Android's APK is now being replaced with AAB.
https://www.thurrott.com/dev/252614/google-is-replacing-android-apk-with-aab
Is anyone doing any work on this? And is there an AAB based on Ren-c that I can use to keep the RebolFoundation developer account alive? Google wants proof we are alive.
Thanks,

item.title: Android AAB?
item.dc:creator: gchiu
item.description:
Android's APK is now being replaced with AAB.

Thurrott.com – 30 Jun 21

Google is Replacing Android APK with AAB - Thurrott.com

And if you don’t know what that means, that’s OK, it probably just means that you’re not an Android developer.

Is anyone doing any work on this?
And is there an AAB based on Ren-c that I can use to keep the RebolFoundation developer account alive? Google wants proof we are alive.

Thanks,

Read full topic
